about_the_game:
Oliver came from a small town to the charming city of London to improve his life and financially support his mother, who had an accident months ago. There, he realized that his creative and investigative skills, which he hadn't fully used in his hometown, were much more valuable at the new newspaper, and he dove headfirst into a complex story. This story will demand so much of his abilities that, after countless extra hours, he starts interacting more with his boss, a man of few words and a dark, mysterious expression, hiding much in his past. Can he be trusted?


My Boss Is Scaring Me is a short, linear BL game with deep reflections on life, problematic relationships, and decisions.
Short story, approximately 10k words.
Two endings, but only one decision.
Linear storyline.
Original CGs.


Screenplay, artwork and development: B.G.Riccetto and M.Graymoon

General support: M.Graymoon

Backgrounds: Original VN Maker and DLCs

Sounds and Musics: Original VN Maker, Cynicmusic, Rony D.Kid and OwlishMedia
A special thanks to M. Graymoon for staying with me and my grandmother, who always believed in my creative ability, and now watches over me from heaven.

content_descriptors.notes: Violence mentioned, detailed murder mentioned, smoking and drinking, stalking, threats

short_description: Oliver, coming from a small town to London, seeks to improve his life and help his mother, who had an accident months ago. At the new newspaper, he discovers his creative and investigative potential, diving into a complex story. There, he grows closer to his enigmatic boss. Is he trustworthy?
